document_data.name: Endugous Than
document_data.mainbody: '''Endugous Than''' was a [[wizard]] and member of the [[Zhentarim]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Endugous was a cunning man whose ambitions carried him toward gathering more power.
document_data.Activities: ''Circa'' [[1369 DR]], Endugous was stationed in [[Snowmantle]] near the [[Border Forest]] where he served under [[Ragnoth]].
document_data.Possessions: He carried a [[quarterstaff]] and wore a pair of ''[[bracers of defense]]''.
document_data.Abilities: He could cast the following spells: ''[[magic missile]]'', ''[[charm person]]'', ''[[phantasmal force]]'', ''[[sleep]]'', ''[[alter self]]'', ''[[Melf's acid arrow]]'', ''[[fly]]'', and ''[[hold person]]''.
